function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Respiratory aerosols containing pathogen-carrying particles emitted during coughing","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne cross-infection and disease transmission","Mitigation":"Improved indoor ventilation systems, use of air purifiers, and wearing appropriate respiratory protection","Technologies":"Air purifiers, HVAC systems with HEPA filters, and N95 respirators","People":"Individuals in enclosed indoor spaces, healthcare workers, and building occupants","Owner":"Building owners, healthcare administrators, and public health authorities"}]}
